fulltext:
TUAN CHAU
2
PROFILE
Experienced over five years in fullstack developer, with that help to me well know the software
business logic, lifecycle of software, so l can build the completed software production by myself, or
team working with specialized teams.
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
Fullstack Developer at CocKeng, Ho Chi Minh
May 2018 - Present
l am fullstack developer at https://www.cockeng.com,
- Designer: Iused Sketch, Photoshop, and Font lcon tools
- Web developer: Iused ReactJs to build the landing page website
- Mobile developer: Iused React Native to build ios, and Android app
- Back-end developer: Iused NodeJs to build back-end, and it is running on Firebase infrastructure.
* Knowledge and skills:
- Experience writing cross-platform apps with React Native
- Experience in working mobile native code on iOS and Android that interfaces with the React
Native application
- Good understanding of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, RESTful APIs, HTTP, and networking concepts
- Experience submit apps to Google Play, and App Store
- Experience publish React Native app Over The Air (OTA) with CodePush
- Experience debuging the javascript code with Google Chrome, VSCode
- Experience in Firestore, Realtime Database, ExpressJs, Push Notification...
- Experience using git tool
- Comfortable product development environments
Fullstack Developer at Raodee Corp, Ho Chi Minh
November 2016 - October 2018
l am fullstack developer at https://raodee.com,
Web developer: Iused ReactJs to build Raodee's website
Mobile developer: Jused React Native to build ios, and Android app
Back-end developer: I used NodeJs to build the microservices of Raodee's backend, like:
Messenger service, Notification service, Photo service, ..
* Knowledge and skills:
- Experience writing cross-platform apps with React Native
- Good understanding of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, RESTful APIs, HTTP, and networking concepts
- Experience submit apps to Google Play, and App Store
- Experience in Microservice, Linux server, ExpressJs, gRPC, ngnix, RadbitMQ, MongoDB, Push
Notification,...
- Experience publish React Native app Over The Air (OTA) with Expo
- Experience debugging the javascript code with Google Chrome, VSCode
- Experience using git tool
SKILLS 
Research
Business logic
System analysis and design
Leadership
Start-up
JavaScript, HTML, CSS, RESTful
APIs, HTTP
ReactJs, Redux, Babel, Webpack,
jQuery
React Native, iOS (Swift, Android
(Java)
NodeJs, ExpressJS, Socket.io
Firebase, Firestore, Realtime
Database, Push Notification,
Storage, Analytic
MongoDB, MySQL, SQL Server
Microservice grpc, nginx,
RabbitMe
O LANGUAGES O
English
Vietnamese
Fullsatck Developer at OQuen, Can Tho
November 2013 - October 2016
Iam fullstack developer at OQuen,
Web developer: Iused JQuery, HTML, CSS to build the OQuen website
Mobile developer: used Cordova to build ios, Android app
Back-end developer: Iused Java to build back-end
S
EDUCATION
Cantho University Software Center, Can Tho
April 2011 - August 2013
Degree: Software engineering
O HOBBIES O
Programming, Fotball, swimming
